title: Easy access to top attractions around the city!
posting_body: Text ID # 291131 to my cell for more info!
Highline offers irresistible luxury apartments in the East Austin neighborhood of MLK Station.
Enjoy easy access to top attractions around the city including parks, restaurants, dining, events, and shopping with MLK light rail station right outside your Austin apartment.
Benefit from close proximity to the University of Texas Austin and explore professional opportunities at the numerous tech companies that call Austin their home.
Our floor plans feature spacious studios, 1 bedroom, and 2 bedroom apartments in Austin, TX designed with you in mind.

Join our pet friendly Austin community and enjoy perks including garage parking, work-from-home lounges, a rooftop deck with kitchen, high-quality stainless steel appliances, and gorgeous views of the state capital right from your apartment window.
When looking to live in Austin, Highline is the perfect place to call home.
